### Description

Remove arp-nd-delete-pending from l2fib-evpn-ip4mac and l2fib-evpn-ip6mac.

N/A

## XPaths Removed

- (L3118)	{L2FIB-EVPN-IPMAC-INFO}/arp-nd-delete-pending
